title: Business Analyst
description:
Immediate Openings in eDominer Systems (Business Analyst)

eDominer System P Ltd is a well-established IT services company since 1995 (). Popular IT brands like EXPAND smERP, PeoplewareIndia, SQLMaestros & DataPlatformGeeks are part of eDominer Systems.

eDominer also owns DataPlatformGeeks, the largest Data/Analytics community of Asia. We hosted Asias First SQL Conference in August in 2015. This was followed by SSGAS 2016 & DPS 2017 in the year 2106 & 2017 respectively. DPS 2017 (last years summit was inaugurated by the IT Minister of Karnataka). This year, Data Platform Summit 2018 was executed at Radisson BLU in Bangalore. Visit to learn more.

EDominer Business Units

SQLMaestros

EXPAND smERP

DataPlatformGeeks

PeoplewareIndia

Data Platform Summit

Job Description Business Analyst

You will be interacting with our customers on site, over the phone and email.

Excellent verbal and written communications skills, presentation skills, in English.

Strong analytical skills, problem-solving abilities, excellent interpersonal skills, knowledge of current technologies and current industrial and business development in India.

Project Management.

Understanding Business of the Client and documenting them.

Performing User Acceptance Testing and provide training to the Users of the client.
Show more
